settings.heading: Stunning headphones. Distraction-free audio.
settings.description: The Flagship ANC headphones offer the holy triumverate of audio - exceptional sound quality and subtle product design at a fair price.

settings.heading: Stunning headphones. Distraction-free audio.
settings.description: The Flagship ANC headphones offer the holy triumverate of audio - exceptional sound quality and subtle product design at a fair price.

settings.heading: Stunning headphones. Distraction-free audio.
settings.description: The Flagship ANC headphones offer the holy triumverate of audio - exceptional sound quality and subtle product design at a fair price.

settings.heading: Noise cancellation comes at a price. Now it`s the right one.
settings.description:
High end NC headphones range are priced at a premium. Bulky and inconvenient, they`re designed for studio environments - not your daily commute or shopping trip.

The Status Flagship ANC headphones fill the gap. With an elegant no-logo design, pro-grade active noise cancelation and wishlist of convenient features, they're everything you ever wanted in a set of headphones, and then some.

settings.second-heading: Cut off ambient noise with the push of a button
settings.description:
Hybrid Digital Active Noise Cancelling. We know, it`s a mouthful. The Flagship ANC Headphones Combine physical NC with cutting-edge active cancellation.

Four external mics detect and neutralize up to 35dB of ambient noise, giving you a distraction-free listening experience every time.

settings.review-message-text: The ambient cancellation is effective; I tested them by running my shop dust collection system which runs about 86 dB at 3 feet - the phones cancelled out all but highest pitch whine.

settings.description:
A detailed, dynamic sound gives you an immersive listening environment for crystal-clear calls and rich, well-balanced music.

Designed by musicians for musicians, our award-winning acoustic tuning and high-definition aptX codecs promise audio quality that punches well above its weight.

settings.review-message-text: Feels like a private concert in my ears. Sounds really pure and clean. Going to take them to Hawaii and try on the plane. Will update!

settings.advantage-description: With a few taps, control your music playback, volume, and voice communication.
Need to stay alert? Instantly hear ambient noise by touching the right ear-cup.
35 hours of continuous music playback with wireless and Active Noise Cancelling on.
Bluetooth 5.0 plus a trusty 3.5mm cabled input (hey, you never know).

settings.heading:
Packed with convenient,
street-friendly features
settings.description: Flagship ANC headphones are designed for the hustle and bustle of modern life.

settings.second-col-underheading: Listen to audio your way, without the inessentials
settings.second-col-description: We stripped the inessentials and put our entire budget into creating the best audio equipment possible. No logos. No flash. Just purpose-built design with a laser-etched product code. Finally, you can enjoy audio your way- without being a walking billboard
settings.third-col-description: These feature premium-quality materials and an unusual, comfort-first oblong design that conforms to the shape of your ears, not the other way around. Wear them all day long without aches, pains, or overheating.

settings.review-message-text: Light and very comfortable, the headset can be worn for many hours without fatigue. Ear cups and headband are incredibly and plush.
“These headphones Status masterfully crafted are a flawless fit for me, aesthetically pleasing, and provide sound quality comparable to the most expensive noise cancelling headphones.“

settings.heading: We`re challenging the status quo of overpriced audio.
settings.bottom-heading: Cutting the inessentials keeps our prices fair.
settings.description:
Our competitors sell via retail middle-men and devote millions to brand awareness and marketing campaigns, significantly inflating the coasts of their products. Status Audio was determined to change that.

The mission is simple - to bring audiophile standards to the masses, and do so with a minimalist design aesthetic. 250,000+ customers and multiple industry awards later, it`s safe to say we`re succeeding.

settings.garantee-description: Doesn`t meet your expectations? Return it within 30 days for a full refund - no questions asked.
We`ll replace your headphones if there are any defects in workmanship or materials.
Made by musicians, for musicians. We strive to make exceptional audio equipment worthy of professionals.
